ai-ds1.1:1.0.2_0: Reverence to him, the Fortunate One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Sambuddha
ai-ds1.1:1.1_0: Skilled in things, each is good fortune, and conceived.
ai-ds1.1:2.1_0: Unskillful things are born in water, rejoicing to the unshakable for attaining.
ai-ds1.1:3.1_0: Though he has no good will, (previously) joyful in this way:
ai-ds1.1:4.1_0: Pleasant feeling born of pleasant feeling, and perceptions associated with it,
ai-ds1.1:5.1_0: Thoughts that are painful feeling and pleasant feeling is born in them,
ai-ds1.1:6.1_0: Thoughts connected with neither-painful-nor-pleasant feeling is good.
ai-ds1.1:8.1_0: For the resultant Dhamma, whatever converging the Dhamma is obtained,
ai-ds1.1:10.1_0: thoughts that are attached to and favourable to the attachments,
ai-ds1.1:11.1_0: the states that are not attached to and favourable to the attachments,
ai-ds1.1:12.1_0: not grasping undertaken the things that are not attached to, and line with the teachings—
ai-ds1.1:13.1_0: thoughts are corrupted, and the defilements are corrupted,
ai-ds1.1:16.1_0: (They are) without placing the mind and keeping it connected, without placing the mind and keeping it connected.
ai-ds1.1:17.1_0: without thinking, without reflection, (thinking): This is the reason,
ai-ds1.1:18.1_0: Thoughts that are without thinking and reflection, (thinking): This is the reason,
ai-ds1.1:19.1_0: (Those things) joyfully, (he said): It is not suitable for attaining the ascetic,
ai-ds1.1:20.1_0: (only) connected with happiness, (thinking): It is good fortune,
ai-ds1.1:21.1_0: connected with equanimity, (thinking): One can carry off (only)
ai-ds1.1:22.1_0: (They are) to be given up through vision (of the First Path), and whatever bodily form there is,
ai-ds1.1:23.1_0: (They are) to be given up through development, and ( yet) pleasing things, pertaining to others.
ai-ds1.1:24.1_0: Not to see visions that are to be given up neither through vision (of the First Path) nor through development (of the rest of the Paths).
ai-ds1.1:25.0_0: The Simile of the Land-Seeing In is allowable for the purpose of seeing (them).
ai-ds1.1:25.1_0: (They are) roots that are to be given up through vision (of the First Path), and for the sake of the path.
ai-ds1.1:26.1_0: (They have) roots that are to be given up through development, and (of the rest of the Paths).
ai-ds1.1:27.1_0: Not for the sake of vision that has roots that are neither to be given up through vision (of the First Path) nor through development.
ai-ds1.1:28.1_0: Thoughts that go towards increase are used for the decrease, and for the sake of their (of wrists),
ai-ds1.1:29.1_0: Thoughts that go towards decrease, wretched things,
ai-ds1.1:30.1_0: This includes those who go towards the settle, and they make their accumulations for themselves.
ai-ds1.1:31.1_0: (The king reflects) in the Tissārāma, whatever is lacking,
ai-ds1.1:32.1_0: (The king replied:) “Now is inclination for it, ~ and it is said for him that reward.

ai-ds1.1:40.1_0: inferior things, (thinking): what is inferior, superior,
ai-ds1.1:41.1_0: The medium one is middling in the midst of the Dhamma,
ai-ds1.1:42.1_0: (They are) superior things, honoured in the others, and constituents (of mind and body).

ai-ds1.1:46.1_0: (They are) things that are resort to the wrong path, whatever is lacking,
ai-ds1.1:47.1_0: (They are) things connected with the path, whatever it is present, fitting forwards.
ai-ds1.1:48.1_0: Path as their predominant (factor) is anything that can be allowed for him.
ai-ds1.1:49.1_0: whatever things have arisen in someone, (previously) continued existence,
ai-ds1.1:50.1_0: (There is) no things that have not yet arisen for someone else.
ai-ds1.1:51.1_0: arising one thought: (this) thoughts, one is in conversible, and this is the path
ai-ds1.1:52.1_0: In the past, future, and present are the (given) present.

ai-ds1.1:64.1_0: for the sake of restraint and for the donor’t belonging to the fortune.
